name: Porcelain Vase by Martin Freyer for Rosenthal Studio-Linie 60's
description:
This amazing and rare Rosenthal vase by Martin Freyer was manufactured in Germany in the 60's. 
It's part of a series of vases inspired by different dynamic and organic shapes found in nature. 

Condition: mint
Unglazed porcelain exterior, glazed interior.

It's 4 Â½ inches/11,5cm tall.
diameter: 5 7/8 inch x 5 3/8 inch / 15cm x 13,5cm
